## ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams.height property

Height above ground in world units of extruded polygon.

Usually, unique per feature, so defaults to `["get", "height"]`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
height?: DynamicProperty<number>;
```
